Text: holy shit!! thanks. i will use this in vmware virtual machine :D

Thanks a lot for seeding this. I've been trying to get 3.11 for workgroups for my old 286. And I still use Win95 and 98. I think 98 is built much better than 2000, XP or Vista. But that's only my opinion

i also agree, the older OS's were more simple and less complex and not stuffed full of a buncha crap you dont even use or need.other than slight incompatibility for some newer stuff older OS's are better (i like windows 95)
